text.3084: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), purejaate  nava, pacchaajaate nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake nava, aahaare nava (cittasamu.t.thaanamuula.m  nocittasamu.t.thaanassa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro kaatabbo. nocittasamu.t.thaano cittasamu.t.thaanassa  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro gha.tane majjhe kaba.liikaaro aahaaro), indriye nava (ruupajiivitindriya.m  eka.m), jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte pa~nca, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava,  natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (sa.mkhitta.m).

text.974: [03] 325^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare  tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane  nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane ^a^V4.0317^ea^ eka.m,  namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni  (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.977: [03] (sahajaatavaaropi paccayavaaropi nissayavaaropi sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi pa.ticcavaarasadisaa  vitthaaretabbaa.)
text.981: [03] 326^b^.^eb^ hetu nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo hetussa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa  hetupaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.982: [03] hetu nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo hetussa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.983: [03] 327^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava  ^a^T5.0084^ea^, samanantare nava, sahajaate  nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni,  aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake nava, aahaare tii.ni, indriye nava, jhaane tii.ni,  magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava,  avigate nava (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.985: [03] 328^b^.^eb^ hetu nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo hetussa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa  ^a^V4.0318^ea^ aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.986: [01] nahetu nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo nahetussa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena  paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo  (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.99: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ hetu akusalo dhammo hetussa akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m).
